类 AppointmentManager

extends java.lang.Object
implements AppointmentManagerInterface

    AppointmentManager

    manage/store appointments

    1.0
    作者:
    zirui

                           int doctorId,

        addAppointment 在接口中 AppointmentManagerInterface
        参数:
        patientId - id of patient
        doctorId - id of doctor
        date - date of appointment
        appType - type of appointment
